item.title: Hive 1.4.2
item.description:
What's changed:

  • added a one-time popup about the Hive 2.0 crowdfunding
  • added sending anonymous system stats to developers (if you agree)
  • fixed some problems with entering fiat currency amounts
  • fiat currency list is updated automatically based on what is supported by BitcoinAverage
  • added "Other Hive Products" link in the Hive menu
  • updated links in the About dialog - now linking to the new site (mac.hivewallet.com) and new Twitter profile (@hive_mac)
  • minor fixes and improvements

item.title: Hive 1.4.1
item.description:
What's changed:

  • you can now export your private key to a file and add it to another wallet app
  • minor UI tweaks for Yosemite (fonts etc.)
  • updated Russian translation
  • if by any chance you still have an unencrypted wallet, you need to set a password before doing anything else

item.title: Hive 1.4
item.description:
What's changed:

  • clicking on a transaction shows a popup with transaction details
  • transaction metadata like label, details, amount in selected fiat currency and exchange rate is now saved for sent transactions
  • flatter look for the transaction and contact lists
  • share button has been moved to the new popup
  • payment label is used as recipient name on the list (e.g. "Sent 1000 bits to bitpay.com")
  • payment transactions are now also broadcasted locally in case the receiving server fails to do that
  • fixed matching of incoming transactions to contacts
  • updated Chinese, Danish and Greek translations

item.title: Hive 1.3.4
item.description:
What's changed:

  • fixed a crash in the Send window when amount field is cleared
  • added a warning on Applications page that we're going to remove all apps in version 1.5 - sorry, we have no time to maintain them :(
  • data stored by apps is now cleared when an app is removed from Hive, and can also be manually deleted using an option from the context menu
  • added a button in "Debugging Tools" that deletes all data stored by all Hive apps
  • updated Romanian translation

item.title: Hive 1.3.3
item.description:
What's changed:

  • support for Dropbox setups with multiple accounts
  • added Google Drive backup option
  • µBTC is now called “bits”
  • in contact/profile edit form, Hive will try to fetch avatar from Gravatar when you provide an address
  • password can no longer be set to an empty string
  • password popup no longer refers to a “passphrase” to avoid confusion with Hive Web BIP32 passphrase
  • fixed some amount rounding errors
  • updated Czech, Finnish, Italian and Russian translations

item.title: Hive 1.3.2
item.description:
What's changed:

  • fixed compatibility with latest version of Dropbox
  • fixed some problems caused by custom versions of Java installed in the system
  • fixed possible crash in send window when pressing enter
  • fixed handling of fiat currency amount in some languages/currencies
  • added Thai translation
  • updated Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Swedish and Urdu translations

item.title: Hive 1.3.1
item.description:
What's changed:

  • added Norwegian, Persian and Ukrainian translations
  • updated Chinese Simplified, Filipino, German, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Portuguese and Spanish translations
  • fixed possible crash during startup wizard

item.title: Hive 1.3
item.description:
What's changed:

  • Payment Protocol (BIP70) support
  • payment details and confirmation note are displayed if provided by the merchant
  • for verified merchants, payment window shows recipient's name instead of address and a green padlock icon
  • new general preferences panel with settings related to contact name display and sorting
  • region settings changes (e.g. number format or name sorting) are applied immediately
  • transactions made from an app are displayed with the app's icon on the transaction list
  • fixed some crashes related to transaction fee calculation

item.title: Hive 1.2.1
item.description:
What's changed:

  • fixed crash in contact autocomplete
  • fixed crash when trying to send whole wallet balance and the fee is too small
  • fixed crash when sending or receving from multisig addresses (starting with 3)
  • fixed handling of fiat amounts without a leading 0 (".50" interpreted as 50)
  • fixed some problems in Bitstamp app
  • error window will not show more than once at a time
  • required fee should now be calculated correctly for large transactions
  • protection from invalid transaction spam (1Sochi)
  • improved compatibility with newest BitcoinQt wallets
  • improved handling of bitcoin: URLs
  • various UI fixes

item.title: Hive 1.2
item.description:
What's changed:

  • added a preferences window (currently only global shortcuts settings)
  • message signing tool
  • super fast initial sync thanks to checkpoints file support
  • lock screen can now be easily disabled
  • fixed problem with Hive locking up when switching tabs on some computers
  • fixed problem with overwriting old backups from a new wallet
  • minor UI/UX fixes

item.title: Hive 1.1.4
item.description:
What's changed:

  • Hive is now properly signed with Apple's certificate
  • improved behavior of the dock icon badge
  • added badge on the transactions tab icon in the sidebar
  • added link to a FAQ in the Help menu
  • fixed problem when migrating from an older version of Hive
  • fixed possible crash caused by other Java software in the system
  • updated App Store app
  • updated Filipino, Japanese translations

item.title: Hive 1.1.3
item.description:
What's changed:

  • fixed a crash in the backup window
  • fixed a crash in the send dialog in some language configurations
  • fixed some problems in the crash report tool
  • fixed application context menu not displaying in translated versions
  • updated some translations

item.title: Hive 1.1.2
item.description:
What's changed:

  • added a lock screen at startup, to prevent someone using your computer from seeing your contacts or transaction list (you can also lock the wallet manually with Cmd+L)
  • right-click context menu on the apps page - you can uninstall applications or contact the app author
  • Dropbox backup will be stored in Apps subdirectory if it exists (unless it's already configured)
  • updated App Store and Mobile Recharge apps
  • fixed problem with disabled submit button in the "Send" dialog

item.title: Hive 1.1.1
item.description:
What's changed:

  • fixed possible crash when opening QR code scanner or user's QR code popup
  • improved QR code scanning
  • fixed some UI issues on OSX 10.7
  • fixed minor UI issues in some languages
  • updated some translations
  • added alert bar that shows up when network connection is down
  • added social media links to "About" window
  • API: added a way to get installed application info

item.title: Hive 1.1
item.description:
What's changed:

  • scanning QR codes - in send window, add contact form and in the top menu
  • added button to display QR code for your own address
  • added “Send feedback” option in menu (see “Help” menu)
  • added info about source of exchange rates data (BitcoinAverage)
  • added cancel button to contact form
  • added warning notification if no backups are configured
  • added App Store app - discover and install more apps
  • updated Bitpremier, Bitstamp and Minefield apps
  • Dropbox backup folder can be changed by holding Alt when clicking “Enable”
  • additional local backups in the same directory, just in case everything else fails
  • added Hungarian translation
  • updated French, German, Greek, Polish, Romanian, Tagalog translations
  • various minor UI improvements
  • fixed crash on startup during Dropbox backup
  • API: added a method do install other apps
  • API: apps can specify which API version they require
  • API: list of available currencies
  • API: disabled WebKit same-origin policy hack

item.title: Hive 1.0
item.description:
Hive is now officially 1.0, woohoo!

What's changed:

  • first run wizard (only if you don't have a wallet yet)
  • if your wallet is unencrypted, you will now see a warning on every start
  • updated apps to latest versions
  • added new Bitstamp app, BitPremier, Coinbase, and Prepaid Mobile Recharge apps
  • "Get more apps" link on apps page
  • sent amount on the transactions list will not include the fee
  • fixed some problems with processing new transactions and transaction status changes
  • Dropbox backup now uses ~/Dropbox/Hive-* folder for backups (unless you've already configured it) - we'll add a way to change this soon
  • fixed some problems with backups
  • UI improvements in send dialog
  • fixed a few minor UI issues
  • updated Finnish, French, German, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish and Tagalog translations
  • updated bitcoinj library
